db:abstract.db:para: For specifying a delegate to paint particles.

db:section.db:title: delegate : Component
db:section.db:para: An instance of the delegate will be created for every logical particle, and moved along with it.

db:section.db:title: fade : bool
db:section.db:para: If true, the item will automatically be faded in and out at the ends of its lifetime. If false, you will have to implement any entry effect yourself.

db:section.db:title: freeze(Item item)
db:section.db:para: Suspends the flow of time for the logical particle which item represents, allowing you to control its movement.

db:section.db:title: give(Item item)
db:section.db:para: Orders the ItemParticle to give you control of the item. It will cease controlling it and the item will lose its association to the logical particle.

db:section.db:title: take(Item item, bool prioritize)
db:section.db:para: Asks the ItemParticle to take over control of item. It will be emitted when there is a logical particle available.
By default items form a queue when waiting for a logical particle, but if prioritize is true then it will go immediately to the head of the queue.

db:section.db:title: unfreeze(Item item)
db:section.db:para: Restarts the flow of time for the logical particle which item represents, allowing it to be moved by the particle system again.
